title: I dreamed that I gave birth to a boy while I was pregnant

preview.html: I dreamed that I gave birth to a boy while I was pregnant. There are many dreams that occur in a person's life and cause him confusion, which makes him search for the appropriate interpretation of this dream, and one of the dreams that is transmitted to a person is the dream of giving birth to a child for a pregnant woman. A woman and some women searched for interpretations of this dream, and in this context we will talk about its interpretation in detail through consistent paragraphs of this article as follows. I dreamed that I gave birth to a boy while I was pregnant. Seeing the birth of a male fetus in a dream is one of the dreams that some pregnant women have because of their obsession during pregnancy and their excessive desire. In the birth of a fetus, there are many indications and interpretations of seeing a boy. In a dream, we review it as follows: It indicates that the birth will be easy. It indicates that the health of the fetus is good. It shows that God will provide a living for the next child. I dreamed that I gave birth to a boy while I was single. Seeing the birth of a boy in a dream from a single girl is one of the dreams that the dream contains This dream has many interpretations, and in Ibn Sirin’s interpretation we will look at different meanings of this dream as follows: It shows that big changes will happen to the girl. It indicates that someone will propose to her. This means that there is an emotional relationship around this girl. This means that There is a lot of food for this girl's family. I dreamed that I gave birth to a boy and I am not pregnant. There are many interpretations related to a woman dreaming of a male child without being pregnant, and we will study these interpretations through a list as follows: It indicates that the dreamer will become pregnant soon. It indicates that God will bless her with goodness. This vision indicates that the dreamer’s life will be filled with happiness. It indicates the end of the health crisis that she is suffering from. I dreamed that I gave birth to a boy and breastfed him. There are many indications that the woman sees that she has given birth to a boy and is breastfeeding him in the dream. These indicators are rather harsh and we will examine them. Through a list as follows: Ray was exposed to this dream in a state of poor health. He was subjected to imprisonment in a specific case. Someone around him was injured. This dream expresses anguish, sadness, and sorrow. Here we have reached the end of this article in which we talked about the dream of seeing a boy in a dream. About a pregnant woman, and how we interpreted this dream, and we also interpreted some dreams close to it, the most important of which is the vision of childbirth. For a boy for an unmarried girl and the birth of a son for a non-pregnant woman.

title: Interpretation of a dream about quarreling with my ex-wife in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a quarrel with my ex-wife in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a quarrel with my ex-wife in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about a quarrel with my ex-wife in a dream could be a sign that his ex-wife is demanding her dues, and God knows best. A quarrel with your ex-husband may also indicate self-control over her, and God knows the unseen. When You see a quarrel with your ex-wife that may lead to you denying her virtue, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees a quarrel with his ex-wife in a dream, this may be a sign of bad things he does to her, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about riding a ship with my ex-wife in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about driving A ship with my ex-wife in a dream could be a sign of sadness, and God knows the unseen. If a man is seen boarding a ship with his ex-wife, then he expresses his regret about the divorce, and God knows best. If a man is seen on a ship with his ex-wife, it may be a sign of kindness. When a man sees a ship with his wife This may be a sign that he will return to her, God willing. Interpretation of a dream that I hugged my ex-wife in a dream. Interpretation of a dream that I hugged my ex-wife in a dream. Whereas if the dreamer sees his ex-wife hugging him, he may regret the divorce, and God knows all that is unseen. When a divorced woman sees her ex-husband’s breasts, this could lead to To memories of Hanin, and God knows best, as it may indicate that he is thinking about returning to his ex-wife, and God knows all the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about seeing my ex-wife’s uncle in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about seeing my ex-wife’s uncle in a dream. We did not find any specific explanations for seeing this. However, seeing your ex-husband’s family in a dream could be a sign of solving problems, as it may be a sign of resolving disputes with your ex-husband, and God knows best. When you see my ex-husband’s brother in a dream, it may be a sign of you returning to your ex-husband, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation Dreaming of my ex-wife giving birth to a child in a dream. However, a divorced woman seeing her ex-husband giving birth to a child may lead to her love for him, and God knows the unseen. If a divorced woman sees her ex-husband giving birth to her child, it may indicate her return, and God knows best. Whereas if a divorced woman sees the birth of a son from your ex-husband This may lead to problems and difficulties. Interpretation of a dream about my ex-husband trying to please me in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about my ex-husband trying to please me in a dream. This may be a sign of paying his debts, and God knows the unseen. If I see my ex-husband trying to please me in a dream, this may be a sign of happiness, and God knows all. What is not seen: If a divorced woman sees her ex-husband in a dream, this may be a sign that she is thinking about him, and God knows the unseen. Also, if a divorced woman sees her ex-husband trying to console her, it may indicate getting rid of sadness, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about seeing my ex-wife without a hijab in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about seeing my wife My ex-wife without a veil in a dream could be a sign of revealing secrets. Also, seeing my ex-wife without a veil may indicate her greed, and God knows best. When you see my ex-wife without a veil in a dream, this may be a sign that I will marry her again.

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about henna for a married woman according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about henna for a married womanHenna is one of the oldest means used by women to decorate and add aesthetic touches before occasions and others, and even today, all those inscriptions are drawn with henna skillfully and precisely on parts of the body.Interpretation of a dream about henna in a dream for a married woman Mostly it carries a good connotation, but sometimes it is a harbinger An omen or an indication of an unpleasant quality. What is the interpretation of a dream about henna for a married woman? Henna in a dream for a married woman expresses her passion for beauty trends and her intense interest in herself, as she always wants to appear at her best. As most opinions say, it is a sign of comfort and luxury, as a result of many Money, goodness, and blessings in the life of the dreamer during the coming period. Henna basically shows her desire to renew her married life before monotony and boredom creep in, so she wants to make some adjustments to regain her vitality and love. It can indicate a desire to show off or deceive people with false appearances, in order to Obtaining a place among people or drawing attention to oneself. It also reflects the many changes that will occur in the coming days and will be a reason to reconsider many of the decisions he made in that period. Past. Perhaps it is a sign of her fear of envy and her desire to hide all her possessions and things from The eyes of those around her to protect her. Some say that henna on the toes indicates the blessing of money or a person’s pursuit of a halal life. He is one of those who care deeply about the source of their work and their gains and does not have any doubts about it. It is also an indication of a woman who is very attached to religion, as she treats everyone on the basis of The teachings of her religion and her upbringing are good, and she does not harm even those who insult her. Some interpreters suggest that whoever puts henna on herself in a dream is evidence that she will face some crises and problems in the coming days, but she will repent a lot to get rid of them and do it to the fullest. But if she sees that her hair is white, she puts Henna to return it to its original color indicates the return of stability and happiness to her married life after a long period of problems and disagreements. Seeing her husband applying henna to her is evidence that they will work to resolve matters between them after a short period of separation and after a long distance. For the most part, Henna is applied as preparation for marriage, so perhaps seeing a husband applying henna indicates that he is in a relationship with another woman and may deceive or betray her. Some say that henna on the right hand indicates the success of children in their future lives and achieving a prestigious position that will make them proud, but placing it on the left is evidence The family enjoys health and well-being, as they are among those who maintain a good healthy diet to maintain their bodies to enhance their immunity and protect them from diseases. Applying henna on one leg but not the other indicates excessive reluctance to make some important decisions regarding some critical issues in the world of her life. Henna In a dream of a married woman according to Ibn Sirin, henna is considered a means of beautification and changing the medical appearance

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing murder in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Interpretation of all types of killing and their threat in a dream in a dream through the interpretation books of Imam Al-Sadiq, Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, Ibn Shaheen, and Ibn Kathir for a married, pregnant, or divorced person. Dreaming of being killed means injustice, corruption, or taking advantage of the killer. Killing the soul can indicate repentance for sins, and we will explain in detail the interpretation of the threat of seeing physical death and its danger in a dream. Interpretation of the dream of seeing murder in a dream by Ibn Sirin: Whoever sees in his pajamas that he has killed a man, this indicates that he has committed something great. It can mean murder in Dreaming of salvation from distress and distraction by saying to the Most High: “Then you killed a soul, so We saved you from grief and you saved us from death...” If one thinks that he committed suicide, this indicates repentance from sin, as God Almighty says: (Repent your innocence and kill yourselves...). Intentional killing or slaughter indicates injustice and aggression and may indicate that you will not abandon prayer. Interpretation of dreams for witnesses to the murder of an unmarried woman: Seeing the killing of a stranger in a dream means that she has gone through difficult stages in her life. If she sees that she committed suicide, this indicates her repentance from her sins and her righteousness in the commandments. God. If you kill an unknown person and ask for blood, this indicates that money is on its way to him. Killing a well-known person can indicate injustice, aggression, or slander. Interpretation of shooting in a dream: Seeing a married woman being killed, this indicates a break in her relationship with her friends or her fear of a bad relationship. Between her and her husband. An unknown or unknown killing or the threat of killing indicates victory and victory over enemies. Interpretation of killing with a knife in a dream If a person sees that he is killing in self-defense, this indicates a positive change in the fortuneteller’s life and an improvement in his living conditions. Murder with a knife can indicate To great benefit and quality, and it can indicate fading and slander. Not killing indicates weakness, humiliation, or failure. Interpretation of killing in self-defense in a dream: Whoever sees in his dream that he is killing someone with a bullet or slaughtering with a knife in self-defense, this may lead to a change in his life. The fortuneteller, that it can happen and a new life is waiting, such as moving to a higher place. A position or obtaining a sum of money and moving to a new place. Interpretation of a dream about killing another person: Murder, whether by knife, bullets, or the threat of death, may indicate damage to one’s sight, defamation, honor, or bad speech. But if the dreamer is the killer, it can express This is through backbiting, gossiping, and slandering lies. Seeing escaping from a killer in a dream. As for the dreamer escaping from murder and escaping from the killer in a dream, this means that the dreamer will overcome the difficulties he will face on his way to achieving his dream and escaping from many dangers, God willing. As for seeing the same person being killed by Fight him, as this will be a warning to him quickly review and organize his life’s affairs, to avoid challenges and problems that will cause him unacceptable crises and disasters.

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing a disabled child in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream in which a child with special needs sees Interpretation of a dream in which a disabled child is seen in a dream, meanings of a disabled child in a dream for a married and pregnant woman, meaning of a disabled child, seeing a disabled child walking, a dream about a disabled child’s smile. The disabled child, the disabled child who is born without any of his senses, the inability to move or the inability to move, his limbs and his disability can be psychological and disability has spread greatly in the world. Interpretation of a dream of a child with special needs in a dream: Interpretation of seeing a disabled child In a dream, it is one of the desirable visions that indicate goodness, livelihood, and well-being for me. Dreaming of a disabled child playing and laughing in a dream is evidence that the dreamer is kind-hearted, loving, loves others, and wishes well for everyone around him. The interpretation of seeing a disabled child walking in a dream is evidence of overcoming judgments and achieving Desires and ambitions. Seeing a mentally disabled child in a dream means that I am receiving happy, joyful and good news after me. Seeing a lame child in a dream means that he is warning me that he is making a good choice and dealing with others intelligently and wisely. Seeing helping a disabled child in a dream is one of the visions Desired, showing the good that the person who has the vision does and God will reward him well. Interpretation of a dream about a child with special needs in a dream for a single woman: Interpretation of dreams about a child with special needs in a dream for a single woman is evidence that she is a good, creative, religious and obedient girl in her family. Seeing a disabled child accepted A woman in a dream indicates a blessing in her life, a happy ally. The interpretation of seeing a disabled child being fed in a dream for an unmarried woman is evidence of overcoming judgments and achieving ambitions and aspirations. A dream in which a disabled child is seen crying in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates that she will go through a difficult period with Many problems and conflicts with parents. Seeing a disabled child at home and dreaming of a divorced single woman is evidence that God will compensate her for her ex-husband in the coming period. Interpretation of a dream about a child with special needs in a dream for a married woman: Seeing a disabled child smiling in a married woman’s dream, this is The vision is good news for her through the disappearance of her fears and receiving good news. The interpretation of a married woman’s dream that she has a disabled child in a married woman’s dream is evidence that she will obtain a lot of goodness and she will obtain a lot of money. The interpretation of a mentally disabled child in a married woman’s dream indicates Psychological comfort, stability, and eliminating disputes with the husband. Carrying a disabled child in a married woman’s dream is evidence that she is a good woman who pleases God and her husband and works to please her children. Seeing a disabled child walking in a dream for a married woman who has not given birth indicates hope and optimism that God will carry her in the near future. Interpretation of a dream about a child with special needs in a dream for a pregnant woman: Interpretation of dreams about a disabled child smiling and playing in a dream for a pregnant woman is evidence of the ease of her birth, her safety, the safety of her fetus, and her good health. Giving birth to a beautiful disabled child in a dream is evidence that she will give birth to a child.

title: The symbol of peaches in a dream

preview.html: The symbol of peaches in a dream for one girl: Seeing peaches in season brings goodness and nourishment to the fortuneteller, and it can be a carrier of sadness and anxiety if peaches are not in season. If an unmarried girl sees that she is planting a peach tree in front of the house, this indicates a good reputation and good morals. It indicates eating Peaches in a dream about coffee indicate marriage to a wealthy man with good character. Buying a large amount of peach juice in a girl’s dream indicates success in her academic life. The meaning of seeing peaches in a dream for a married woman: Seeing someone selling peaches in the markets spoiled and in bad condition is evidence of fatigue and unhappiness for the fortuneteller. If a married woman dreams that her husband is buying him peaches, and they are delicious and taste delicious, then this indicates happiness and stability. The wife’s purchase of peaches from the market is evidence of wealth and abundance of money, God willing. A woman’s vision in a dream of her husband buying peaches from the market and she ate from them is evidence of... Pregnancy soon with a male child. You may be interested: Interpretation of seeing peaches in a dream: Eating, buying, and picking. The meaning of peaches in a pregnant woman’s dream. Seeing peaches in dreams is a sign of blessing and strength for whoever sees them, and the interpretation also varies according to the season and its shape. title: Interpretation of a dream about cutting a snake for a married woman

preview.html: In our article today, we will make it easy for you, dear reader, to find the interpretation of your dream in the following lines from the website gptafser.com/. Interpretation of seeing a snake in a dream for a single girl. Scientists explain the dream of an unmarried girl who saw a white snake. This is a warning to the girl that there is someone who would like to approach her, but it is bad to pay attention. To him. But if the snake is far away, uncovered, and injured. This is good news for her that this person will stay away from her by God’s command and she will get rid of him and his bad behavior. If an unmarried woman sees a black snake in her dream, kill it and get rid of it. It is a sign from God Almighty that her problems She will find solutions. The crises she went through in her life will end and she will not fall into adversity again, thanks to God. The great scholar Ibn Sirin explains the vision of an unmarried girl cutting off the head of a snake in her dream. It is a sign that good things are coming to her, such as her getting close to marrying a good man. Seeing a severed snake head in an unmarried woman’s dream is evidence that this girl will achieve everything she wants in this world, scientifically and emotionally. If she sees a snake in her dream, this means that there are problems and sorrows resulting from emotional problems. See also: Seeing a snake In a dream for a married woman. Interpretation of seeing a snake being cut in a dream for a married woman. Interpretation of seeing a married woman cutting a snake in a dream. This indicates that the fears that she suffered from in the previous days of her life will soon disappear. It also indicates that she has gone through many hardships at the hands of the people closest to her, But by the grace of God, it will go away. The dream also indicates the large number of people who are with her, belittling her and showing their love for her. But in reality, they are her enemies and wish harm on her and her family. Interpretation of seeing a snake being cut with a knife in a married woman’s dream. It is a sign for the dreamer that she will be victorious over all surrounding enemies. With it, she will succeed in her life and family affairs. Seeing a married woman cutting a black snake in her sleep. This dream shows the end of the problems in her life that she faces from her enemies in life. A married woman dreams of seeing a black snake in her sleep. It indicates the existence of a conflict between her and her enemies and is sometimes interpreted as the presence of A struggle with herself. If a married woman dreams that she is burying a snake. Details of the final disposition of any disputes and disagreements between the banner and her enemies. If a married woman dreams that she is cutting a snake, and sees that it dies in front of her and comes back to life. A sign for a married woman that she cannot forget the past nor It remains in her memory, which leads to her bad condition. Mental. If a married woman sees in her dream that she is cutting the snake from its head. This dream indicates that the dreamer gets rid of the evil people in her life and is waiting for them in her life. If a married woman dreams that she is cutting the snake into three equal pieces And his head is wrapped. This is evidence that this woman will divorce her three times. In the event that a snake is seen and the dreamer cuts off its head, this indicates payment of debts and soon relief. It is also interpreted as a message to the visionary to be careful when dealing with others. Interpretation of a dream about cutting off a snake.

title: Interpretation of a dream about saving cigarettes in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about giving away cigarettes in a dream We may want to know the interpretation of the dream about giving away cigarettes in a dream, one of the very disturbing dreams, so they are looking for an interpretation of this dream, but the reader must be forbidden and not believe completely, because it is from the jurisprudence of some scholars who seek to reach The truth, and to be correct, is that the site and its managers have nothing to do with interpretations. Interpretation of the dream of giving away cigarettes in a dream: Giving away cigarettes in a dream may indicate the generosity that the dreamer enjoys at this time, and God knows best. In the event that the person sees that he is giving If someone sees cigarettes as a gift, this may indicate the presence of new friends entering his life during this period. It is possible that seeing a gift of cigarettes in a dream indicates the sincerity of the feelings that the dreamer has at that moment, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about giving saffron in a dream: It is possible that Seeing a gift of saffron in a dream indicates the dreamer’s good morals, and God knows best. A dream about giving saffron in a dream may indicate the good nature of the dreamer and his closeness to those around him. If a person sees that he is giving saffron to those around him, this may indicate the good deeds that he does for others thanks to God. If you see a gift of saffron in a dream, it may indicate the fulfillment of desires and dreams during this period, thanks to God. Interpretation of a dream about a mother giving gold to her daughter in a dream. If the girl sees that her mother was giving her gold as a gift, this may indicate that she will be fine at that time, And God knows best. A dream of a mother giving gold in a dream to her daughter may indicate the expansive life that the girl may have in those days. Anyone who sees in her dream that she is receiving gold from her mother in a dream may indicate positive changes occurring in her life during that period. If one sees a mother If she gives a soccer ball to her daughter in a dream, this may indicate her assuming a high position and her success in professional life, thanks to God. Interpretation of a dream about a husband giving his wife a nightgown in a dream. A woman who sees her husband giving her a nightgown may indicate positive changes occurring in her life during this period, thanks to God. A husband’s dream of giving his wife a nightgown in a dream may indicate the emotional closeness that occurs between them at this time, and God knows best. It is possible that seeing a husband giving his wife a nightgown in a dream may indicate the fulfillment of desires and desires during this period, and God knows best. Seeing a husband giving his wife a nightgown in a dream may indicate a happy event coming to the family in those days, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about giving a black rosary in a dream Giving a black rosary in a dream may indicate the abundance of livelihood that the dreamer may gain during this time, And God knows best. A person dreams that he received a black rosary in a dream as a gift, which may indicate a lot of money and a great source of livelihood that he can obtain in those days. If a person sees himself receiving a black rosary in a dream, this may indicate goodness that will come to him Next season thanks

title: Interpretation of seeing someone covering me in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a man covering me in a dream: Seeing someone covering me in a dream, there are signs that the person covering the fortuneteller wants to support the opinion and provide assistance to him. It indicates that this person loves the divine and asks him for protection, peace of mind, and a safe life. It also indicates the goodness of the dreamer, and his possession of the qualities Praiseworthy, and his closeness to his uncle. It indicates that the dreamer has more calm and peace in bed and stability that he will experience in his real life. Interpretation of dreams of someone covering me with a blanket for a single womanCovering with a small blanketIn a dream of an unmarried woman, there is good news about her imminent marriage and someone will come to her asking for her hand in marriage. But if she knows the person covering her, this is a sign that this person will stand by her side to solve her problems, and he is someone close to her fiancé. Regarding a dirty blanket, it means falling into worry and anguish. Interpretation of seeing my lover covering me in a dream: Seeing a lover in a dream covering the fortuneteller with a clean blanket, if the fortuneteller is a man, It is a sign of the righteousness with which he is blessed. If the covering is dirty, it symbolizes a neglectful woman who does not care about her condition and the condition of her husband. As a married woman sees her husband covering her in a dream, this indicates how much her husband loves her, as well as the extent of emotional stability and a trouble-free married life. Interpretation of a dream about a man covering his face: Covering the face for men is a symbol of good luck, and it is a sign of the man who holds one of the most prestigious positions. It also indicates the good reputation and high status of the man in the society in which he lives. It also indicates that the righteous woman in the man’s life tries to cover up her husband’s mistakes in front of People. We see the man covering his face and then taking off the veil, and his face shows that this man is going through financial difficulties, but God is helping him. Or covering the face in red, which indicates that a woman is not healthy in a man’s life. He covers his face with a veil. The woman in it is the humiliation and humiliation that the man suffers in His real life. The wife covering her husband with her hijab is evidence of her mockery of him and her lack of respect for him. The interpretation of a dream about a man covering his hair indicates the success of the dreamer and the achievement of his exhausting goals, and he worked hard to achieve that if the covering was clean. Covering the hair with a black cover says that the dreamer is one of the simple people who rules justly, They want to tell the truth and prove the strong personality that characterizes the dreamer. It is also a harbinger of a new life in which he will enjoy family stability and blessings in money and a child. It is also an indication of the prestigious position that the fortuneteller enjoys in his society or receiving a promotion or a prestigious position. Removing his head covering in front of people indicates Losing the position that he could have enjoyed for any reason or appearing in many crises, such as loss of trade or loss of position, and the resulting psychological pressure. Interpretation of dreams of someone covering me while I sleep. The vision indicates help or support from someone in the affairs of his life and he can recognize it And heading to him in reality. I saw in my dream the man covering me and I am happy. It means that a man is approaching you while you are in distress and distress. Perhaps he is passing by cheerfully.

title: Interpretation of removing caries in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of extracting a decayed tooth in a dream: There is no doubt that any person in reality, when he knows that he will extract a tooth, will be very upset, so when a man or woman dreams that he will remove a tooth in a dream, they are beyond anxiety and fear, so they search for the interpretation of this dream, as Removing a tooth in a dream shows instability and removing the upper left molar in a dream shows a lot of debt. Existing in the dream, and there are many and varied interpretations according to the dreamer himself, so we will talk in today’s article on the site. Various about an article entitled Interpretation of extracting a rotten tooth in a dream. Interpretation of extracting a rotten tooth in dreams. Ibn Sirin says that the interpretation of extracting a tooth in a dream indicates the age of the person himself. He sees that all his teeth have fallen out, this indicates that all members of his family will die in front of him or get sick. When a person sees his teeth falling out, this indicates that he will live for a long time in life. Whoever sees in his dream that his teeth have fallen out of his hand, this indicates that he He will get a lot of money. If one sees his teeth falling into his lap, this indicates that a male will be born. While we find that seeing teeth falling to the ground indicates that the dreamer is approaching death. Click on the image to go to the store and complete the purchase. Read also Interpretation of a dream about transporting a girl to a married woman. Symptoms of successful detonation of a needle. Interpretation of a dream about tooth extraction. We see that a dream about removing a wisdom tooth indicates that a person cannot act wisely and logically. Also, extracting a rotten tooth indicates that the person is relieved of the problems that accompany him at work. Interpretation of a dream about a broken tooth after the conversation. In the previous paragraphs about the interpretation of removing a sore tooth in a dream, we will talk in this paragraph about the interpretation of a dream about removing fangs: Removing fangs indicates the loss of the reasons that help people live. Also, removing one of the fangs shows the dreamer that he will lose one of his parents in life. We believe that seeing The removed fangs are evidence of a man’s freedom from these problems he faces. Interpretation of a dream about a tooth being pulled out. If the dreamer sees a healthy tooth coming out, this is an indication that the dreamer has given up on something in his life. If a person sees the extraction of decaying or painful teeth, this is a warning of trouble. If a person sees a moving tooth in his mouth, it may be possible to remove it instead of leaving it in an unstable position. Interpretation of a dream about extracting a tooth and putting it back Ibn Sirin sees that the interpretation of extracting a rotten tooth in a dream, and whoever sees that he extracted his tooth and then put it in its place in the mouth, means the engagement will return. Or the husband returns or returns. To work. Whoever sees that he pulled out a tooth and another tooth appeared in its place immediately, this means that he will lose his husband, friend, or fiancée. Interpretation of a dream about teeth falling out: Whoever sees that his teeth are falling out while he is working, this indicates the number of years he has spent at work. If a person sees his teeth falling out, This indicates the longevity of that person. Read also: Pregnancy experiences after hysterosalpingography The best time to have sex after an injection to conceive a boy Interpretation of removing cavities in a dream by Ibn Sirin If a person sees in his dream that his teeth hurt, this indicates that he is cheating on his wife.
